page.title: 08Cornwood bus services
page.content: Local villages have set up a committee to look at the possibilities of a community bus to take people to Ivybridge and the Tesco superstore at Lee Mill. Cornwood has 2 bus services (of 4 buses each) travelling via Plympton to Plymouth, 10 miles away. Ivybridge(3 miles away) provides a library; health-centre; chemist and shops, but residents without a car cannot reach these facilities. A community bus would provide a useful service to these people.However,some people believe that the bus will close down the two village shops,one of which,incorporates a sub-post office. Many pensions and child allowances are collected from this post office, giving people a chance to get out and meet friends and neighbours. Final decisions have still to be made.
